title: [Caffe2] How to change Operator parameters in C++ ?
body_html:
Hello,

I have loaded a Detectron model (found in model zoo) in a Workspace and I would like to change the value of "nms_th" parameter which is in the operator GenerateProposals.

How can I change this value (0.7 by default) from my C++ code, through the Workspace object ?

Actually, from the Workspace, I can get a vector of Operators from the NetBase object.
Then, I think I need to modify the OperatorDef private member variable, but I cannot manage to do this.

Thanks for your help :)
body_text:
Hello,
I have loaded a Detectron model (found in model zoo) in a Workspace and I would like to change the value of "nms_th" parameter which is in the operator GenerateProposals.
How can I change this value (0.7 by default) from my C++ code, through the Workspace object ?
Actually, from the Workspace, I can get a vector of Operators from the NetBase object.
Then, I think I need to modify the OperatorDef private member variable, but I cannot manage to do this.
Thanks for your help :)
body:
Hello, 

I have loaded a Detectron model (found in model zoo) in a Workspace and I would like to change the value of "nms_th" parameter which is in the operator GenerateProposals. 

How can I change this value (0.7 by default) from my C++ code, through the Workspace object ? 

Actually, from the Workspace, I can get a vector of Operators from the NetBase object. 
Then, I think I need to modify the OperatorDef private member variable, but I cannot manage to do this. 

Thanks for your help :)
